title: Modern Music
lyrics:
Modern music
For a modern world
I'm a modern guy
Moving into darkness
At full speed

Modern life is a palace

Built on endless suffering

I'm standing at the gates

Pissing in the wind



Nobody wants to look at the dark heart

And I don't blame them

Nobody wants to look at the dark heart

Myself included

I'm just looking for a good time

And a little cash



Modern feelings

For a modern age

I'm looking at the future

Fading into darkness

In front of me



Modern dreams are a prison

Built in endless factories

I'm standing at the gates

Pissing in the wind



Nobody wants to look at the dark heart

And I don't blame them

Nobody wants to look at the dark heart

Myself included

I'm just looking for a good time
